THE NORTH WALES CHILDRENS HOME  CHILD ABUSE SCANDLE.. we need this petition to be signed and get justice and to see what they ARE HIDING AND GET JUSTICE.. AND IT TO BE MADE PUBLIC AND PUBLISHED.. VICTIMS NEED ANSWERS..
Mr Jillings’ report was never published because of fears at Clwyd council it would be liable for compensation claims from youngsters who had suffered.“It should be put to rest because I feel that the youngsters who were there are now well into their lives.
“I would have thought they would want to see it put to rest as well rather than being constantly reminded.” No Pedophilles should be insured and let of from this couruption.. PLEASE SIGN..
